body.name: Stiive Bluetooth Headphones, 5.3 Wireless Sports Earbuds IPX7 Waterproof with Mic, Stereo Sweatproof in-Ear Earphones, Noise Cancelling Headsets for Gym Running Workout, 16 Hours Playtime - GreenBlack

features: Low latency, Fast and Stable Connection: Our Bluetooth 5.3 headphones can fast connection to previously paired devices after power on, low power consumption is enough to let you work out all day. Music and calls tend to have 0 latency, clearer sound, more stable calls, perfect audio and video synchronization.

Amazing Audio Experience: With the dynamic drivers, our wireless earbuds has a truly authentic sound and powerful bass. Also these running headphones are designed with noise-canceling microphone to better filter background noise and capture your voice even when answering calls while driving, biking and running.

Dual Waterproof Protection: With IPX7 waterproof rating and interior nano-coating technology, our workout headphones can effectively withstand sweat or rain, making wireless headphones functions well and safely during workout.

Up to 16 Hours Playtime: The rechargeable battery of Bluetooth earbuds supports up to 16 hours of playtime with just 2 hours of charging. Prolonging time meets your demands of continuous and enjoyable exercise. And it will show the remaining battery power of the headphones on your Phone screen. (Note: Please fully charge it by using the charging cable that comes with it for the first use)

Super Soft and Secure Fit: With a lightweight and ergonomic design, our sport headphones are a great combination of comfort and stability with ear-hook and in-ear fitting designed for strenuous workouts for outdoor or home. Comes with 4 sizes eartips (XS/S/M/L) to perfect fit your ear.
body.description: Easy Control Buttons With buttons located directly on your workout headphones, you can easily adjust the volume, play and pause music, skip tracks, answer and end calls, and activate voice control on your phone with simple commands via your headphones. How to Control? Power on : Long press the MFB 2 seconds Power off : Long press the MFB 3 seconds Play / Pause : Press the MFB 1 time Siri / Voice Assistant : Press the MFB 2 times Answer/Hang up Calls : Press the MFB 1 time Reject Calls : Long press the MFB 2 seconds Last Number Redial : Hold the "+" and "-" buttons at the same time for 2 seconds Previous / Next Track : Long press "-" / "+" Volume Up / Down : Press "+" / "-"

Otherwise your bluetooth earbuds may be damaged from sweat. Wildly Compatibility This sport wireless earphone can connect any Bluetooth devices with Bluetooth version 5.0 or above. Comes with a Carry Bag Equipped with a carry bag, convenient to carry and protect your running headphones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great, I bought 3 of them and recommend them to everyone who asks. I've used one pair for several months with 0 issues. It can connect to 2 devices at once, charges very quickly (~30 min) and has great battery life (~6 to 8 hours). Also seems very durable and weatherproof. They do get a little uncomfortable in my ears if I wear them for >60 minutes, but they also stay in my ears very well, they are great for running/working out. I also use them for phone calls and the mic seems to be decent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been searching for the "ideal" bluetooth earbuds for two decades now, and have finally found them. I use them for sleep, providing background noise without which I can't fall or stay asleep. First and foremost, they had to have a strap between the earbuds - I've had many fine pairs of earbuds with no strap, and still have one bud from each of them, the other having vanished almost immediately. A close second requirement is battery life. Less than 8 hours is a pain. These have 16 hours of battery life, the best I've ever seen, and it is honest. Sound quality is quite good, as is the noise cancellation. They're rugged, the controls are first rate, and they're visible without being garish - that makes them harder to lose. They're the best overall I have ever found, and a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not waterproof, but amazing battery life!
reviews.reviewText: Before I start with the positives, I want to give you all a warning about these "waterproof" earbuds that you might want to know about.My main caveat with these earbuds is that they're not entirely waterproof, even to slight water damage such as rain. The design features a small foam cube on the inside of the right earbud. This cube is meant to provide a cushion for the volume buttons, but is very susceptible to retain moisture. Should you take this in the rain for instance, this cube could get wet and damage the wiring inside the hardware. These designs try to prevent this from happening by adding a wax coating between the foam cube and the circuit board, but it is still not enough. I have had many earbuds of this design and they always have wiring problems, such as one earbud completely losing signal and damaging the sound quality. I have had to return these earbuds for a replacement because I accidentally left them on a shelf in my shower. Bear this in mind when you purchase these earbuds.Outside of that, these are outstanding earbuds for the price due to two things: the USB-C port and the insane battery life. The sound quality is decent, but it is nothing compared to the battery life. I work long hours and have had these earbuds on my head for over 24 hours and I have had no low battery signal. I have even left these earbuds on overnight by accident and still have enough juice to get me through a workday. It is by far the most battery I have gotten from earbuds of this price.It's even better that these headphones have a USB-C port. If you are not familiar, a lot of old devices have used various ports, such as Micro USB. These designs were inconvenient, and could not be plugged in except for a specific angle. USB-C does away with that and allows you to plug into your headphones at any angle. I'm glad this is slowly becoming the standard, as even stingy Apple have adopted this with their devices.For the price, it's a must own. My only other negative thing would be that the headphones do not power off on their own like previous models do. Sometimes I forget that it's even on and, like I said, I have had moments that it had stayed on overnight. As long as you're a little mindful, it's not a big deal. These headphones are great to have! I would highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and great sound quality
reviews.reviewText: Great sport-buds - comfortable, great sound, easy to pair with devices, great price. Gotta get another pair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at the sound quality and ease of use. I liked that a case was included. Time will tell as far as durability, but they pair easily and sound great. The ear pieces stay in place for me just fine (your ear shape may vary). Telephone check was successful proving the microphone works. What a great value. Multiple size buds are included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked well for about 8 months but now only right headphone has sound.
reviews.reviewText: Great sound when new and for about 8 months or so (until issues started - see next para). USB C charging was a plus. Charges fast and charge lasts for a long time. Connects pretty well to devices. Good range. Used it both indoors and outdoors (hot and cold weather). Great for hiking.However, these kind of headphones invariably seem to stop working after a few months (8 months in this instance). In my case, the left headphone has stopped working almost completely, which is annoying. I have to buy new ones again and I’m not sure I will be buying this brand again.On the whole, quite cheap compared to the more expensive headphones. I did like them and used them often. But would have liked these to last at least a year. The limited reliability is why I have to give it 3 stars.Buy it if you only need an option that lasts 6 months or so - in which case these are quite ideal and would work out great for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars inexpensive, good audio quality
reviews.reviewText: what is not to like? works great. I have several similar styles, use them to listen to podcasts when working in garden and to take phone calls when I cannot pick up my phone.
Suenan muy bien, tiene buena cancelación de ruido, son muy excelentes

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen producto con excelente relación calidad - precio
reviews.reviewText: Tengo pocos días con estos audífonos así que actualizaré posteriormente esta publicación. En principio, estoy sorprendido con la calidad del audio ya que es bastante decente si consideramos que el precio es muy bajo. Lo único que hay que hacer para mejorar la experiencia es ajustar un poco las gomas al interior de los oídos. Son cómodos y los ganchos permiten que se ajusten correctamente. En cuanto a la duración de la batería, es aceptable. Resta valorar cuánto duran a mediano plazo y si efectivamente su clasificación IPX7 es real ya que necesito someterlos a rutinas de ejercicio exigentes. Por ahora, sorprendido y contento con estos audífonos.---ACTUALIZACIÓN: Después de más de un mes de uso y con rutinas a veces muy exigentes en cuanto a sudor, los audífonos siguen funcionando sin ningún problema. Sin duda son IPX7 como indica la descripción. Vale la pena comprarlos.
Fueron un regalo y la persona está encantada con ellos, aunque se despegaron en una ocasión se arreglaron y siguen como nuevos

reviews.reviewTitle: Espectacular muy buenos y con buena duración
reviews.reviewText: Me encantarin funcionan muy bien y la pila les dura mucho
